name: Tom Throop's Bridge Baron
overview: Bid and Play over a billion random deals. Winner of 1986 CES AWARDS. Tom Throop's Bridge Baron was the Winner-1st Computer Bridge Tournament Bid and play over 1 million deals, or input your own. New features include: • Weak 2-bid option • Rubber bridge scoring Hint feature • 2-person play • Save deals to disk • Automatic play
